testcase.classname: Verify End 2 End functionality of RS component website
testcase.name: Verify End 2 End flow with one Product
testcase.system-out: Given User open RS component website........................................passed When Enter a valid item "Digital Thermometers" into search field............passed And Select Brand filter & sub filter and Click Apply........................passed And Enter Product Quantity "1" and click Add product........................passed Then Verify Product "Digital Thermometer" under checkout Page...............passed

testcase.classname: Verify End 2 End functionality of RS component website
testcase.name: Verify End 2 End flow with Multiple Filter & Multiple Products
testcase.system-out: Given User open RS component website........................................passed When Enter a valid item "Digital Thermometers" into search field............passed And Select Multiple filter & sub filter and Click Apply.....................passed And Select Two Product with Quantity "1" each and click Add product.........passed Then Verify Product "Digital Thermometer" under checkout Page...............passed

testcase.classname: Verify the Search functionality of RS component website
testcase.name: Verify the Search criteria with valid Product Digital Thermometers without login to application
testcase.system-out: Given User open RS component website........................................passed When Enter a valid item "Digital Thermometers" into search field............passed Then Verify search item "Digital Thermometers" in search result section.....passed And Verify Result product page should contain atleast one result record.....passed

testcase.classname: Verify the Search functionality of RS component website
testcase.name: Verify the Search criteria with invalid product Digital Thermometers item
testcase.system-out: Given User open RS component website........................................passed When Enter a valid item "Cricket Bat" into search field.....................passed Then Verify zero search result "We couldn't find any results for 'Cricket Bat'" in search result section..passed

testcase.classname: Verify the Search functionality of RS component website
testcase.name: Verify Result product after Apply filter on Search criteria
testcase.system-out: Given User open RS component website........................................passed When Enter a valid item "Digital Thermometers " into search field...........passed And Select Brand filter & sub filter and Click Apply........................passed Then Verify Result product page should contain atleast one result record....passed
